nodes.text: Thyrsus was a terrestrial astronomical object. On Thyrsus, farming was seen as a cowardly occupation, only undertaken by those who did not wish to fight. During the High Republic Era, when the Starlight Beacon space station was to host the annual meeting of the Galactic Agricultural Alliance, Administrator Velko Jahen was unfamiliar with the importance placed on agriculture, but was reminded that not every system had the same stance as was held on Thyrsus.
